channel.title: CVE Feed for LionScripts -- IP Blocker Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-30479|2024-06-06T16:16:39.915Z -- lionscripts -- ip%20blocker%20lite
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in LionScripts IP Blocker Lite allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects IP Blocker Lite: from n/a through 11.1.1.
